lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Carole Ryavec, an analyst at Salomon Brothers Asia Ltd, said "The major overall issue is to stimulate the domestic economy and move away from an export-dependent economy."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Analysts noted Japan's Ministry of International Trade and Industry (MITI) has already ordered chipmakers to cut production in order to dry up the source of cheap chips sold in third countries at non-regulated prices.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "If the tariffs remain in place for any length of time, there will be complete erosion of exports to the United States," said Tom Murtha, analyst at James Capel and Co.
